descriptor.name: Chocolate cake
descriptor.short_desc: Indulge in layers of rich, moist chocolate cake, filled and topped with creamy fudge frosting.
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in layers of rich, moist chocolate cake, filled and topped with creamy fudge frosting for an unforgettable taste experience. Our chocolate cake is crafted with premium cocoa and fresh ingredients.
